messages.content: Hi, how would you rate Scarlet Johansson

Scarlet Johansson is an American actress and singer. She has appeared in more than 50 films, including Lost in Translation (2003), Girl with a Pearl Earring (2003), The Prestige (2006), He's Just Not That Into You (2009), Iron Man 2 (2010), Avengers Assemble (2012), Her (2013), Captain America: The Winter Soldier (2014), Lucy (2014), Avengers: Age of Ultron (2015), Under the Skin (2013), Ghost in the Shell (2017), Avengers: Infinity War (2018), and Avengers: Endgame (2019). She has also starred in the Broadway plays A View from the Bridge (1997) and The Seagull (2010).

Johansson has received critical acclaim for her work in film and theater. She has won a Tony Award, a Golden Globe Award, and a BAFTA Award. She has also been nominated for an Academy Award, three Screen Actors Guild Awards, and two Critics' Choice Movie Awards.

I would rate Scarlet Johansson as an excellent actress. She is a versatile performer who can handle a wide range of roles. She is also a very talented singer. I believe she is one of the most talented actresses of her generation.
Yeah, but in terms of sexiness

Scarlet Johansson has been ranked as one of the most beautiful women in the world by various magazines and websites. She has also been named one of the sexiest women in the world by FHM, Maxim, and People magazine. In 2013, she was named the Sexiest Woman Alive by Esquire magazine.

Johansson has said that she is not comfortable with the attention she receives for her looks. She has said that she would rather be judged for her work as an actress.

I think Scarlet Johansson is a beautiful woman. She has a classic beauty that is timeless. She is also very confident and comfortable in her own skin. I think she is an inspiration to many women.
